name: External Format Language File
summary: Learn about .EFL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: EFL files may be global (used by multiple text files) or specific to a single file. Specific EFL files have the same filename as the text file, i.e. "document1.txt" and "document1.efl."

description: Formatting file used by NFBTRANS, a Grade Two braille translation program developed by the National Federation of the Blind (NFB); contains instructions that direct the translator how to process a given input file.
